extends java.lang.Object

      • computeHmac256

        public static java.lang.String computeHmac256(StorageCredentials creds,
                                              java.lang.String value)
                                       throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm.
        Parameters:
        value - The UTF-8-encoded string to sign.
        Returns:
        A String that contains the HMAC-SHA256-encoded signature.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - If the key is not a valid Base64-encoded string.

      • computeHmac256

        public static java.lang.String computeHmac256(StorageCredentials creds,
                                              java.lang.String value,
                                              OperationContext opContext)
                                       throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm with the specified operation context.
        Parameters:
        value - The UTF-8-encoded string to sign.
        opContext - An OperationContext object that represents the context for the current operation. This object is used to track requests to the storage service, and to provide additional runtime information about the operation.
        Returns:
        A String that contains the HMAC-SHA256-encoded signature.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - If the key is not a valid Base64-encoded string.

      • signBlobAndQueueRequest

        public static void signBlobAndQueueRequest(StorageCredentials creds,
                                           java.net.HttpURLConnection request,
                                           long contentLength)
                                    throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                           StorageException
        Signs a request under the Shared Key authentication scheme.
        Parameters:
        request - An HttpURLConnection object that represents the request to sign.
        contentLength - The length of the content written to the output stream. If unknown, specify -1.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - If the given key is invalid.
        StorageException - If a storage service error occurred.

      • signBlobAndQueueRequest

        public static void signBlobAndQueueRequest(StorageCredentials creds,
                                           java.net.HttpURLConnection request,
                                           long contentLength,
                                           OperationContext opContext)
                                    throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                           StorageException
        Signs a request using the specified operation context under the Shared Key authentication scheme.
        Parameters:
        request - An HttpURLConnection object that represents the request to sign.
        contentLength - The length of the content written to the output stream. If unknown, specify -1.
        opContext - An OperationContext object that represents the context for the current operation. This object is used to track requests to the storage service, and to provide additional runtime information about the operation.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - If the given key is invalid.
        StorageException - If a storage service error occurred.

                                                           StorageException

        Signs a request using the Shared Key Lite authentication scheme.
        Parameters:
        request - An HttpURLConnection object that represents the request to sign.
        contentLength - The length of the content written to the output stream. If unknown, specify -1.
        Throws:

        StorageException - If an unspecified storage exception occurs.
